docs.lead_paragraph: Note: This lesson was originally published on an older version of The Learning Network; the link to the related Times article will take you to a page on the old site.
docs.abstract: In this lesson, students consider whether a number of statements about binge drinking are true or false. They then consider facts about health topics featured in The Times and write an article for their school newspaper about a health topic that affects teenagers.

docs.lead_paragraph: Despite pleas from doctors, immigration law is preventing the sister of a legal permanent resident, whose wife recently died after giving birth, permission to visit to help care for the baby.
